name: 林郁修
objective:
類神經網路具有 universal approximation 的特性（非線性函數近似器）；因此，其可被應用於控制器設計。另外，其也可被應用於解決分類 / 迴歸（函數近似）（時間序列建模與預測）問題。本課程內容包含：(1) 介紹，(2) 類神經網路，(3) 類神經網路應用於分類問題，(4) 類神經網路應用於迴歸（函數近似）問題以及 (5) 應用。
This course covers important concepts and topics of Artificial Neural Networks (ANN) that can be developed and used to solve classification or function approximation problems. The outline of this course is given as follows. (1) Introduction, (2) ANN, (3) ANN applied in classification, (4) ANN applied in function approximation, and (5) Applications.
